snippet: KOZLIK--Judith. May 11, 2016. Judy was a funny, tough and generous lady who loved her family and her hometown of New York City. She will be missed by all who had the good fortune to know her, but most dearly by her daughter Arlene and son-in-law Charlie whom she loved with all of her heart. Rest in peace Mom. 1/3
lead_paragraph: KOZLIK--Judith. May 11, 2016. Judy was a funny, tough and generous lady who loved her family and her hometown of New York City. She will be missed by all who had the good fortune to know her, but most dearly by her daughter Arlene and son-in-law Charlie whom she loved with all of her heart. Rest in peace Mom. 1/3
